name: frs-hide-scrollbar
description: Easy & lightweight solution for cross-browser scrollbar hiding

scripts.build:bundle: parcel build index.mjs index.scss -d dist -o FRS-hide-scrollbar --detailed-report
scripts.build:browser: node ./scripts/replace "let FRSHideScrollbar =" "let FRSHideScrollbar = window['FRSHideScrollbar'] =" src/scripts/FRSHideScrollbar.mjs | node ./scripts/replace "export default FRSHideScrollbar;" "" | google-closure-compiler  --compilation_level ADVANCED --isolation_mode IIFE --assume_function_wrapper --js_output_file dist/FRS-hide-scrollbar.browser.js
scripts.prerelease: yarn test-coverage && yarn build && git add dist && git add docs
scripts.postrelease: git push --follow-tags origin master && yarn publish
scripts.clean: rimraf dist/**/* && rimraf docs/*.dist.html && rimraf docs/report.html && rimraf docs/*.{js,css,map} && rimraf coverage

author: Jakub Freisler <FRSgit@users.noreply.github.com>
